com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.caching

Class LRUCachingDataLoader<Id,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.AbstractDataLoaderDecorator<Id,T>
      • com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.caching.LRUCachingDataLoader<Id,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    Id - The id type used to identify the partition, i.e. tile ids or generic ids.
    T - The type of data loaded.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CachingDataLoader<Id,T>, com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.caching.internal.LRUCachingDataLoaderImpl<Id,T>, DataLoader<Id,T>
    Deprecated. 
    Use methods based on OptimizedMapLayers instead. Since SDK 2.54.

    public class LRUCachingDataLoader<Id,T>
extends AbstractDataLoaderDecorator<Id,T>
implements com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.caching.internal.LRUCachingDataLoaderImpl<Id,T>
    A common implementation for different data loaders that can be wrapped in an LRU cache.

    The cache size is limited to the given maximum size (in number of elements).

    param: inner the wrapped data loader. param: size the internal cache's size limit.
